hero.subtitle: Stop guessing – Houston analyzes your goals, creates data-driven strategies, and gives you concrete action items. Save 10h/week and achieve measurable results.

cta.start: Start Free – No Credit Card Required

features.subtitle: Concrete tools that save you time and deliver measurable results.

feature1.title: SMART Goals in 60 Seconds
feature1.description: Create measurable marketing goals with AI support – instead of 2 hours manual work. Houston analyzes your industry and suggests concrete KPIs.

feature2.title: 5 Action Items Per Week
feature2.description: Get weekly concrete tasks based on your goals. Houston prioritizes automatically and shows you what matters now.

feature3.title: Track 20+ KPIs Automatically
feature3.description: No more Excel chaos. Houston monitors your marketing performance in real-time and alerts you when goals are at risk.

pricing.subtitle: Start for free or upgrade for more features.
